past client reviews

What we do

We build custom web scrapers to crawl and extract data from web pages. Results will be stored in csv/excel files, or databases. To be accurate and flexible, each web scraping requirement will need a scraper of its own, instead of using a generic software.

Typical web scraping requests:
  • Product price data scrape: to scrape websites for product price, deails and images
  • Price monitoring: to setup a system that will scrape product data from websites and deliver results to you daily/weekly basis.
  • Build a web scraping tool: to create a web scraping tool so that you can use it yourself, on-demand.
  • Emails extraction: to crawl a large list of websites and extract the contact emails. We can also help you find the website list based on keyword/regions.

Our Story

We started off web scraping career on Upwork, since 2008. After many years of sucess there, we created our own brand, ExactData.io, focusing on accurate data and flexible solutions.
